title: Subpart 1727-2 - Determination Of Eligibility For Admission Or Continued Occupancy
content:
Subpart 1727-2 - Determination Of Eligibility For Admission Or Continued Occupancy

State Regulations
§ 1727-2.1 - Income limitations
§ 1727-2.2 - Responsibilities of housing company
§ 1727-2.3 - Determination of income
§ 1727-2.4 - Reporting of income and family composition
§ 1727-2.5 - Income reexamination procedure-annual and interim changes
§ 1727-2.6 - Tenant's refusal to cooperate in income determination
§ 1727-2.7 - Effective date of rent changes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
